name: Disco Night
description:
Welcome to the disco night, it will bring you a lot of fun!

The unique music & ball game, you just need to keep tapping the screen, the ball will fall from the top, light up all the stars, activate the slot machine, get coin rewards, unlock all kinds of music to start your disco night .

A variety of different genres of music, waiting for you to unlock! Which would be your favorite?
1. Funk
2. Jazz
3. Electronics
4. Blues
5. Reggae
......

Hey! Come and download this fun game! Let us find happiness in this game!
